data.name: Generate JSFuck Program
data.description:
# Task

In this task, you need to implement a program that converts text into jsfuck.

JSFuck is an esoteric subset of JavaScript, where code is written using only six characters: `[, ], (, ), ! and +`. This language is somewhat similar to Brainfuck.

You need to implement support for the following characters: `abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789 `.

At the input to the program, you will receive a string containing a set of only valid characters. You need to output a string that is equivalent to the input string and also contains only valid JSFuck characters.

You can read more about this language [here](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/JSFuck).

# Examples

```
  let input = "a";
  
  // You should end up with something like this.
  convertToJSFuck(input); => "(![]+[])[+!![]]"
```

```
  let input = "123";
  
  // You should end up with something like this.
  convertToJSFuck(input); => "(+!![]+[])+(+!![]+!![]+[])+(+!![]+!![]+!![]+[])"
```
